node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `patch` ( `patch_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `for_node` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `field` varchar(80) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `cur_status` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `assigned_to` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `purpose` varchar(240) DEFAULT NULL, `instructions` varchar(240) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`patch_id`), KEY `for_node__cur_status` (`for_node`,`cur_status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: patch
